department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: pair of silver and turquoise earrings, pierced ear style; cluster of 7 turquoise at top with silver drops and silver wire; lower band of 4 turquoise bordered with twisted wire; still lower band of 4 turquoise bordered with silver wire and 6 silver wire rods hanging below; bands attached to upper cluster with silver links
title: Earrings
